trans-unit.source: Please go on {order_link} to finalize the payment.
trans-unit.target: Por favor, vai a {order_link} para finaliza-lo pagamento.

trans-unit.source: You have selected to pay by wire transfer.
Here are the bank details for your transfer:
trans-unit.target: Velaquí tes os datos bancarios para a túa transferencia:

trans-unit.source: If you have a guest account, you can follow your order via the "Guest Tracking" section on our shop.
trans-unit.target: Se tes unha conta de convidada, podes segui-la túa encomenda a través da sección "Seguimento para Convidadas" da nosa tenda.

trans-unit.source: You have selected to pay by check.
Here are the bank details for your check:
trans-unit.target: Velaquí tes os datos bancarios para o teu cheque:
Enderezo de correo electrónico da/o clienta/e:
A túa mensaxe ao Servizo de Atención á Cientela de {shop_name}

trans-unit.source: Your message has been sent successfully.
We will answer as soon as possible.
trans-unit.target: Responderemos tan axiña como sexa posible.

trans-unit.source: You can review this credit slip and download your invoice from the "My credit slips" section of your account by clicking "My account" on our shop.
trans-unit.target: Podes revisar este recibo e descarga-la túa factura dende a sección "Os meus albarás" da túa conta premendo en "A miña conta" na nosa tenda.

trans-unit.source: Thank you for your order with the reference {order_name} from {shop_name}
trans-unit.target: Grazas pola túa encomenda coa referencia {order_name} dende {shop_name}
A túa información de acceso a {shop_name}
Servizo de atención á clientela - Conversa transcrita
Creación da túa conta de clienta

trans-unit.source: Please be careful when sharing these login details with others.
trans-unit.target: Por favor, ten coidado cando compartas este datos de acceso con outras persoas.

trans-unit.source: You have received a new log alert
Unfortunately, one or more items are currently out of stock. This may cause a slight delay in your delivery. Please accept our apologies and rest assured that we are working hard to rectify this.
trans-unit.target: Desafortunadamente, un ou máis artigos están actualmente esgotados. Isto pode causar un lixeiro atraso na túa entrega. Por favor, acepta as nosas desculpas e fica segura de que estamos a traballar duramente para corrixir isto.
Os teus novos datos de acceso a {shop_name}
Solicitude de restablecemento do contrasinal para {shop_name}

trans-unit.source: To confirm this action, please use the following link:
trans-unit.target: Por favor, para confirmar esta acción emprega a seguinte ligazón:

trans-unit.source: Your payment for order with the reference {order_name} was successfully processed.
trans-unit.target: O teu pagamento para a encomenda coa referencia {order_name} procesouse correctamente.

trans-unit.source: There is a problem with your payment for {shop_name} order with the reference {order_name}. Please contact us at your earliest convenience.
trans-unit.target: Hai un problema co teu pagamento para a encomenda realizada en {shop_name} coa referencia {order_name}. Por favor, ponte en contacto connosco tan axiña como che sexa posible.

trans-unit.source: We cannot ship your order until we receive your payment.
trans-unit.target: Non podemos envia-la túa encomenda ata que recibamos o pagamento.

trans-unit.source: We are currently processing your {shop_name} order with the reference {order_name}.
trans-unit.target: Actualmente estamos a procesa-la túa encomenda a {shop_name} coa referencia {order_name}.

trans-unit.source: We have processed your {shop_name} refund for order with the reference {order_name}.
trans-unit.target: Procesamos o teu reembolso dende {shop_name} para a encomenda coa referencia {order_name}.

trans-unit.source: In order to reply, please use the following link: {link}
trans-unit.target: Para responder, por favor, emprega a seguinte ligazón: {link}

trans-unit.source: This is to inform you about the creation of a voucher.
trans-unit.target: Creamos un cupón de desconto para ti.

trans-unit.source: This item is once again in-stock.
trans-unit.target: Este artigo está outra vez en stock.

trans-unit.source: You can access the product page by clicking on the link:
trans-unit.target: Podes acceder á páxina do produto premendo na ligazón:

trans-unit.source: You can order it right now from our online shop.
trans-unit.target: Podes pedilo agora mesmo dende a nosa tenda online.

trans-unit.source: A new order was placed on {shop_name} by the following customer: {firstname} {lastname} ({email})
trans-unit.target: A seguinte clienta realizou unha nova encomenda en {shop_name}: {firstname} {lastname} ({email})

trans-unit.source: You can review your order and download your invoice from the "Order history" section of your customer account by clicking "My account" on our shop.
trans-unit.target: Podes revisar a túa encomenda e descargar a túa factura dende a sección "Historial de encomendas" da túa conta premendo en "A miña conta" na nosa tenda.

trans-unit.source: If you have a guest account, you can follow your order via the "Guest Tracking" section on our shop.
trans-unit.target: Se tes unha conta de convidada, podes segui-la túa encomenda a través da sección "Seguimento para Convidadas" da nosa tenda.

trans-unit.source: The stock cover is now less than the specified minimum of:
trans-unit.target: A cobertura do stock é agora menor có mínimo especificado de:

trans-unit.target: O stock que queda é agora menor có mínimo especificado de

trans-unit.source: Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter, please confirm your request by clicking the link below :
trans-unit.target: Grazas por te subscribires ao noso boletín de novas. Por favor, confirma a solicitude premendo na ligazón de embaixo:

trans-unit.source: Regarding your newsletter subscription, we are pleased to offer you the following voucher:
trans-unit.target: Respecto á túa subscrición ao boletín de novas, temos o pracer de che ofrecer o seguinte cupón:
Os teus datos de acceso a {shop_name}

trans-unit.source: We noticed that during your last visit on {shop_name}, you did not complete the order you had started.
trans-unit.target: Notamos que durante a túa última visita a {shop_name} non completáche-la encomenda que tiñas comezada.

trans-unit.source: Thank you for your order at {shop_name}.
You are one of our best customers and as such we want to thank you for your continued patronage.
trans-unit.target: Es unha das nosas mellores clientas e, como tal, queremos agradecerche o teu continuo apoio.

trans-unit.source: Enter this code in your shopping cart to get your discount.
trans-unit.target: Introduce este código no teu carro da compra para obte-lo teu desconto.

trans-unit.source: You are one of our best customers, however you have not placed an order in {days_threshold} days.
trans-unit.target: Es unha das nosas mellores clientas, porén non realizaches ningunha encomenda nos últimos {days_threshold} días.

trans-unit.source: Thank you for creating a customer account at {shop_name}.
trans-unit.target: Graciñas por creares unha conta en {shop_name}.
Velaquí tes os teus datos de acceso:

trans-unit.source: Always keep your account details safe.
trans-unit.target: Mantén sempre a salvo os datos da túa conta.

trans-unit.source: Never disclose your login details to anyone.
trans-unit.target: Nunca reveles os teus datos de acceso a ningúen.

trans-unit.source: Should you suspect someone is using your account illegally, please notify us immediately.
trans-unit.target: Se sospeitas que alguén está a emprega-la túa conta ilegalmente, por favor, notifícanolo decontado.

trans-unit.source: You can now place orders on our shop:
trans-unit.target: Agora podes realizar encomendas na nosa tenda:

trans-unit.target: Creouse unha nova encomenda ao teu nome.
Por favor, envía o teu cheque por correo a:

trans-unit.target: Podes acceder á túa conta de clienta na nosa tenda:

trans-unit.source: You have received a new message regarding order with the reference
trans-unit.target: Recibiches unha nova mensaxe respecto á encomenda coa referencia

trans-unit.source: Thanks for your order with the reference {order_name} from {shop_name}.
trans-unit.target: Graciñas pola túa encomenda coa referencia {order_name} dende {shop_name}.

trans-unit.source: Please note that this will change your current password.
trans-unit.target: Por favor, ten en conta que isto vai mudar o teu contrasinal actual.

trans-unit.source: Please do not reply directly to this email, we will not receive it.
trans-unit.target: Por favor, non contestes directamente a este correo electrónico; non o recibiremos.

trans-unit.source: You have received a new return request for {shop_name}.
trans-unit.target: Recibiches unha nova solicitude de devolución para {shop_name}.

trans-unit.source: Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter.
trans-unit.target: Grazas por te subscribires ao noso boletín de novas.

trans-unit.source: Your cart has been saved, you can resume your order by visiting our shop:
trans-unit.target: Gardouse o teu carro; podes retoma-la túa encomenda visitando a nosa tenda:

trans-unit.source: Simply copy/paste this code during the payment process for your next order.
trans-unit.target: Simplemente copia/pega este código durante o proceso de pagamento da túa próxima encomenda.

trans-unit.target: Velaquí o código do teu cupón:

trans-unit.target: Creamos un cupón ao teu nome por ternos recomendado a unha amiga/o.

trans-unit.source: Your order with the reference {order_name} has been placed successfully and will be shipped as soon as we receive your payment.
trans-unit.target: A túa encomenda coa referencia {order_name} realizouse correctamente e enviaráseche tan axiña como recibamos o teu pagamento.

trans-unit.source: We have generated a credit slip in your name for order with the reference {order_name}.
trans-unit.target: Xeramos un albará ao teu nome para a encomenda coa referencia {order_name}.

trans-unit.source: You have {nbProducts} product(s) now available for download using the following link(s):
trans-unit.target: Agora tes dispoñibles {nbProducts} produto(s) para descargar empregando a(s) seguinte(s) ligazón(s):

trans-unit.target: Velaquí tes a túa información persoal de acceso a {shop_name}:

trans-unit.source: {employee} wanted to forward this discussion to you.
Your guest account for {shop_name} has been transformed into a customer account.
trans-unit.target: A túa conta de convidada para {shop_name} transformouse nunha conta de clienta.

trans-unit.source: Your order with the reference {order_name} is currently in transit.
trans-unit.target: A túa encomenda coa referencia {order_name} está actualmente en tránsito.

trans-unit.source: Warning: you have received a new log alert in your Back Office.
trans-unit.target: Atención: recibiches unha nova alerta no teu Panel de Administración.

trans-unit.source: Your order with the reference {order_name} from {shop_name} has been canceled.
trans-unit.target: A túa encomenda coa referencia {order_name} a {shop_name} foi cancelada.

trans-unit.source: Your order with the reference {order_name} from {shop_name} has been changed by the merchant.
trans-unit.target: A túa encomenda coa referencia {order_name} a {shop_name} foi modificada pola vendedora.

trans-unit.source: You have received a new message from {shop_name} regarding order with the reference {order_name}.
trans-unit.target: Recibiches unha nova mensaxe de {shop_name} respecto da encomenda coa referencia {order_name}.

trans-unit.source: You have requested to reset your {shop_name} login details.
trans-unit.target: Solicitaches restablece-los teus datos de acceso a {shop_name}.

trans-unit.source: Your order with the reference {order_name} has been shipped.
trans-unit.target: A túa encomenda coa referencia {order_name} foi enviada.

trans-unit.source:
This is a test e-mail from your shop.

If you can read this, the test was successful!
trans-unit.target:
Esta é unha proba de correo dende a túa tenda.

Se podes ler isto, a proba fíxose con éxito!

trans-unit.source: A voucher has been created in your name as a result of your order with the reference {order_name}.
trans-unit.target: Creouse un cupón ao teu nome coma resultado da túa encomenda coa referencia {order_name}.

trans-unit.source: As an incentive, we can give you a discount of {amount}% off your next order! This offer is valid for {days} days, so do not waste a moment!
trans-unit.target: Coma incentivo, podemos darche un desconto do {amount}% na túa vindeira encomenda! Esta oferta é válida durante {days} días, así que non perdas nin un momento!

trans-unit.source: As our way of saying thanks, we want to give you a discount of {amount}% off your next order! This offer is valid for {days} days, so do not waste a moment!
trans-unit.target: Para darche as grazas, queremos darche un desconto do {amount}% na túa vindeira encomenda! Esta oferta é válida durante {days} días, así que non perdas un momento!

trans-unit.source: As appreciation for your loyalty, we want to give you a discount of {amount}% valid on your next order! This offer is valid for {days} days, so do not waste a moment!
trans-unit.target: Como agradecemento pola túa fidelidade, querémosche dar un desconto do {amount}% válido para a túa vindeira encomenda! Esta oferta é válida durante {days} días, así que non perdas un momento!

trans-unit.source: We wish to thank you for the trust you have placed in us and want to give you a discount of {amount}% valid on your next order! This offer is valid for {days} days, so do not waste a moment!
trans-unit.target: Desexamos agraderche a confianza que puxeches en nós e queremos darche un desconto do {amount}% válido para a túa vindeira encomenda! Esta oferta é válida durante {days} días, así que non perdas nin un momento!

trans-unit.source: Your order with the reference {order_name} has been modified.
trans-unit.target: A túa encomenda coa referencia {order_name} foi modificada.

trans-unit.source: You are advised to open the product's admin Product Page in order to replenish your inventory.
trans-unit.target: Aconséllaseche abri-la administración da Páxina de Produto do produto para repoñer o teu inventario.

trans-unit.source: Your referred friend {sponsored_firstname} {sponsored_lastname} has placed his or her first order on {shop_name}!
trans-unit.target: A túa amiga/o {sponsored_firstname} {sponsored_lastname} realizou a súa primeira encomenda en {shop_name}!

trans-unit.source: We are pleased to offer you a voucher worth {discount_display} (voucher # {discount_name}) that you can use on your next order.
trans-unit.target: Témo-lo pracer de che ofrecer un cupón polo valor de {discount_display} (cupón # {discount_name}) que podes empregar na túa vindeira encomenda.

trans-unit.source: Your friend {firstname} {lastname} wants to refer you on {shop_name}!
trans-unit.target: A túa amiga/o {firstname} {lastname} quere recomendarche {shop_name}!

trans-unit.source: We are pleased to offer you a voucher worth {discount} that you can use on your next order.
trans-unit.target: Témo-lo pracer de che ofrecer un cupón por valor de{discount} que podes empregar na túa próxima encomenda.

trans-unit.source: Get referred and earn a discount voucher of {discount}!
trans-unit.target: Sigue a recomendación e gaña un cupón de desconto de {discount}!

trans-unit.source: It's very easy to sign up. Just click here!
trans-unit.target: É moi doado rexistrarse. Simplemente preme aquí!

trans-unit.source: When signing up, don't forget to provide the e-mail address of your referring friend:
trans-unit.target: Cando te rexistres, non esquezas proporcionar o enderezo de correo electrónico da amiga ou amigo que che fixo a recomendación:
